mapper.sql: select bid as bid, book_master, bname, participants1 as book_participant1, participants2 as book_participant2, participants3 as book_participant3, participants4 as book_participant4, create_time, b_status from book_total
mapper.update: update book_total set b_status = 99 where bid = #{bookId} and b_status != 99 and book_master = #{bookMaster}
mapper.insert: insert into book_total (book_master, bname, b_status, create_time) values (#{bookMaster}, #{bookName}, 1, NOW())
